name: iClimate

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: climate pal
des: iClimate gives information about the climate conditions in cities around the world. The skill also educates users through quizzes and provides random facts about the climate.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
